subject: Boxing
Marriages
lead_paragraph: Mike Tyson is married for a third time, two weeks after the death of his 4-year-old daughter. The owner of the La Bella Wedding Chapel at the Las Vegas Hilton hotel-casino said Tyson, the 42-year-old former heavyweight champion, and Lakiha Spicer, 32, exchanged vows Saturday in a private ceremony. Records in Las Vegas show that Tyson and Spicer got a marriage license about 30 minutes before their ceremony.
